channel.title: Dragon b axe special
channel.description:
Hi, where abouts would I find the special of a d b axe?, Like how do I add the special bar under the attack types, my whip has it but not anything else.
And whats the ID for the circle that goes around u, and how u swing the axe in the air ty.
